ancientTemple.name: snakes
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Snakes! Jump over them by saying 'whee'!

ancientTemple.name: blow darts
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Blow darts incoming! Say 'woah' to roll under them!

ancientTemple.name: floor spikes
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Floor spikes up ahead! Shout 'whee' to jump!

ancientTemple.name: arrows
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Arrows! Duck under them by saying 'woah'!

ancientTemple.name: swinging axe
ancientTemple.preObstacle: A swinging axe! Remember to say 'whoa' to duck!

ancientTemple.name: collapsing floor
ancientTemple.preObstacle: The floor ahead looks unstable! Shout 'whee' to jump!

ancientTemple.name: sleeping jaguar
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Yikes, a jaguar! Keep it away by using your 'whip'!

ancientTemple.name: rolling rock
ancientTemple.preObstacle: I see a rolling rock coming this way! Say 'whee' to jump!

ancientTemple.name: spider web
ancientTemple.preObstacle: Eww, a big spider web! Shout 'whip' to clear the way!

ancientTemple.name: poison gas
ancientTemple.preObstacle: There's poison gas in the air! Say 'woah' to slide under!

pirateBay.name: rocks ahead
pirateBay.preObstacle: Rocks ahead! Say 'turn' to avoid them!

pirateBay.name: sailors
pirateBay.preObstacle: Sailors! Let them know we're friendly by shouting 'ahoy, mateys!'

pirateBay.name: pirates
pirateBay.preObstacle: Evil pirates! Give your crew the signal by shouting 'boom'!

pirateBay.name: big wave
pirateBay.preObstacle: Woah, that's one big wave! Say 'whee' to speed up and get over it!
pirateBay.headsUp: Uh oh, big wave coming up!

pirateBay.name: mermaids
pirateBay.preObstacle: I see mermaids! They'll attack if you don't say 'ahoy, mateys!'

pirateBay.name: pirate queen
pirateBay.preObstacle: The dreaded pirate queen! Defend with our cannons by saying 'boom'!

pirateBay.name: kraken
pirateBay.preObstacle: The Kraken is real! Shouting 'foom!' to keep it away is our only hope!

pirateBay.name: sea snake
pirateBay.preObstacle: Oh no, an enormous sea snake! Say 'foom' to use the giant harpoon!

pirateBay.name: shipwreck
pirateBay.preObstacle: We're approaching a shipwreck. Say 'whee' to speed through it!

pirateBay.name: barrel bomb
pirateBay.preObstacle: You better say 'turn' to avoid those barrel bombs coming our way!

kingdomChase.name: wall
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief ran into a wall! Say 'climb' to climb over it!

kingdomChase.name: moat
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Water coming up! splash across by saying 'splash'!

kingdomChase.name: rose bush
kingdomChase.preObstacle: A rose bush coming up! Say 'whee' to not get poked!

kingdomChase.name: dragon
kingdomChase.preObstacle: No way, a dragon! Shout 'hide' before it sees you!

kingdomChase.name: tomato
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief has a tomato! Say 'woah' to duck under it!

kingdomChase.name: baby ducks
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Oh no, baby ducks up ahead! Jump over by saying 'whee'!

kingdomChase.name: bee hive
kingdomChase.preObstacle: The thief has a beehive! Duck under by saying 'woah'!

kingdomChase.name: bandit
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Bandit incoming! Zap it away by shouting 'zap'!

kingdomChase.name: troll
kingdomChase.preObstacle: I see a hungry troll! Be sure to hide by saying 'hide'!

kingdomChase.name: goblin
kingdomChase.preObstacle: Give that goblin up ahead a taste of magic by shouting 'zap'!
